Message: From then on, I was in top form.

Every human who dared come
to vanquish me were sent
back home utterly defeated.
Unbeaten, I was!

But, negligence is always
the greatest of enemies...

One day, a horde of humans
came to vanquish me.

Naturally, I delivered
my punishment unto them all.

But at that moment,
a strange melody reached my ears.

’Twas quite a pleasant melody,
and my heart felt as if
’twas being purified...
Oh, how I wished to listen to it more...

until suddenly, I was engulfed
in a blinding light!
“Be still, and reflect on all thou hast done!”

That voice was the last sound
I heard before finding myself
sealed away inside a magic crystal...
